hints.content:
To find how many fewer arms the $\maroonD{\text{starfish}}$ has than $\blueE{\text{octopus}}$, we can subtract.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d9aca2af5e23cc6a7df6eb2054e6d8814b3d4a57)

$\blueE{8} - \maroonD{5} = \goldE{\Box}$

Let's subtract to find the number of $\goldE{\text{fewer arms}}$.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e4b0db325dffaa633018d2633c190fbfbda6264b)

$\blueE{8} - \maroonD{5} = \goldE{3}$
The starfish has $\goldE{3}$ fewer arms than the octopus.

question.content:
An octopus has $8$ arms.

A starfish has $5$ arms.
 
**How many fewer arms does the starfish have than the octopus?**

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] arms
